item.title: [일론 머스크] 제1원리 사고법: 추정이 아닌 근본적인 문제로의 접근
item.description: [일론 머스크] 제1원리 사고법: 추정이 아닌 근본적인 문제로의 접근 # ​ I do think there’s a good framework for thinking. It is physics. You know, the sort of first principles reasoning. Generally I think there are.. what I mean by that is boil things down to their fundamental truths and reason up from there, as opposed to reasoning by analogy. Through most of our life, we get through life by reasoning by analogy, which essentially means copying what other people do with slight variations.
